      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lime water and carbon dioxide reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkwasser- und Kohlendioxydreaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction d'eau de chaux et d'anhydride 
carbonique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação da água de cal e do dióxido de carbono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione dell'acqua di calce e dell'anidride 
carbonica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση ύδατος και διοξειδίου του άνθρακα ασβέστη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción del agua de cal y del bióxido de 
carbono</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the reaction of carbon dioxide with lime water to produce calcium carbonate which makes the lime water cloudy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">breath</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solubility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Reaktion des 
Kohlendioxyds mit Kalkwasser zum Erzeugniskalziumkarbonat, welches das
Kalkwasser bewölkt bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réaction de 
l'anhydride carbonique avec l'eau de chaux au carbonate de calcium de 
produit ce qui rend l'eau de chaux nuageuse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reação do dióxido de
carbono com água de cal ao carbonato de cálcio do produto qual faz a
água de cal cloudy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la reazione 
dell'anidride carbonica con l'acqua di calce al carbonato di calcio 
dei prodotti quale rende l'acqua di calce nuvolosa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αντίδραση του 
διοξειδίου του άνθρακα με το ύδωρ ασβέστη στο ανθρακικό άλας 
ασβεστίου προϊόντων που καθιστά το ύδωρ ασβέστη νεφελώδες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reacción del 
bióxido de carbono con agua de cal al carbonato de calcio del 
producto cuál hace el agua de cal nublada.</string>
          </description>
